Vampirtron:
     As the laser dug into his arm he yanked it away, falling off the table doing so. "Beast mode," He said, transforming. The wolf growled at Kenzo, as Vampirtron slowly moved towards the door. 
 catmastero wrote:He felt the arm grab his neck and responded by grabbing his right hand
around the arm "Not really" he grunted as his index finger on his left
hand changed into a laser, he then attemped to use it to cut off the
end of the arm.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Lestat Lioncourt <thevmprlestat2000@y...> wrote:
> 
> Vampirtron:
>      He ignored Kenzo's questioning, "Do you like it?" He said, then
Vampirtron shot one of his arms straight towards Kenzo's neck,
attempting to strangle him, "DO YOU LIKE BEING FOOD FOR AN IMMORTAL?!"
He yelled at Kenzo.
>  catmastero wrote:--- In nbwrpg@y..., Lestat Lioncourt
<thevmprlestat2000@y...> wrote:
> > 
> > (OOC: Since nobody decided to reply to me, although there is a 
> transformer in the room with  him, I'm going to send it again)
> > 
> > Vampirtron:
> > 
> >      Now pinned down to the table and sedated he was starting to 
> calm, his eyes were still red, and if released he would try to 
> attack, although he wouldn't get far. It took him ten times as long 
> to do a simple task now that he was under.
> > 
> >      After a few minutes of struggeling he gave up and conserved 
> his strength. He saw the other transformer in the room, one he hadn't 
> gotten the name of. He was awake enough to speak and make 
> sense. "What is your name?"
> 
> OOC: Sorry, I must have skipped a message by mistake
> IC:
> 
> "Kenzo" he said preparing some tools "Do you know what they added to 
> you to make you need to feed off of transformer energon.
